subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: It’s been more than 70 years since a British man won Wimbledon. How long will it be before Ricky Rubio plays basketball for the Minnesota Timberwolves?
snippet: It’s been more than 70 years since a British man won Wimbledon. How long will it be before Ricky Rubio plays basketball for the Minnesota Timberwolves?
